context_bundle.summary: DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) workflows for multi-agent orchestration. Models task dependencies, ensures correct execution order, enables parallel execution of independent tasks. DC = orchestrator in PhiVector.

onboarding.quick_start: DAG = task graph with dependencies. Node = task, edge = dependency. DC orchestrates: resolve dependencies, execute in order, parallelize independent tasks. No cycles allowed (acyclic).
common_patterns: Define tasks with prerequisites: {id, action, depends_on: []}
Parallel execution: Tasks with no shared dependencies
Centralized orchestration: DC assigns tasks to agents

known_errors.cause: Circular dependency (A depends on B, B depends on A)
known_errors.solution: Validate DAG is acyclic before execution
known_errors.prevention: Use topological sort validation, detect cycles upfront
